DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effects of Short Foot Exercises on pain, biomechanical characteristics and functionality of lower extremity in patients with patellofemoral pain.
DOC.brief_title: The Foot Exercises in Patellofemoral Pain
DOC.criteria: aged between 2560 diagnosed as patellofemoral pain syndrome Pregnancy Having walking disability Having a trauma, knee surgery or other arthritis
